2022-10-14 Riddler Classic
==========================
If there are $n$ people in the room with $n$ distinct birthdays,
let $N(n)$ be the expected number of people in the room when they eat cake.

$$ N(n) = n(n+1)/365 + (365-n)N(n+1)/365 $$

$$ N(365) = 366 $$

Using [code](20221014c.hs), $N(0) =  \approx 24.62$.
